publishing_focus.primary_focus: Christian leadership, Church history, Christian education
publishing_focus.target_audience: Emerging Christian leaders, educators, pastors, and anyone involved in church leadership or Christian education
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: We publish industry-leading resources aimed at training, equipping and inspiring the Christian leaders of tomorrow. Our authors are recognized experts in their fields, ensuring our content is both trustworthy and relevant.
publishing_focus.example_titles: Authors like Bill Hybels, John C. Maxwell; Titles like 'Courageous Leadership', 'The 21 Irrefutable Laws of Leadership'
